doc:
Elizabeth Ashley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Ashley 0 Elizabeth Ashley (born August 30, 1939) is an American actress of theatre, film, and television. She has been nominated for three Tony Awards, winning once in 1962 for Take Her, She's Mine. Ashley was also nominated for the BAFTA and Golden Globe awards for her performance in The Carpetbaggers (1964), and was nominated for an Emmy Award in 1991 for Evening Shade. Elizabeth was a guest on The Tonight Show with Johnny Carson 24 times. Elizabeth_Ashley ( born August_30 , 1939 ) is an_American_actress of theatre , film , and television . She has_been_nominated for three_Tony_Awards , winning once in 1962_for_Take_Her , She 's Mine . Ashley was_also_nominated for the_BAFTA_and_Golden_Globe_awards for her_performance in The_Carpetbaggers ( 1964_) , and was_nominated for an_Emmy_Award in 1991 for Evening_Shade . Elizabeth was a_guest on The_Tonight_Show with Johnny_Carson_24_times .
